org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class Tooltips

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Tooltips

  • public class Tooltips
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration element to set all attributes and features of the tooltip.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      boolean isDisplayColors()
      If true, color boxes are shown in the tooltip.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns if tooltips are enabled.
      boolean isIntersect()
      if true, the tooltip mode applies only when the mouse position intersects with an element.
      void merge(NativeObjectContainer source, java.lang.String property)
      Merge a native object into this one with a specific property name.
      This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration into options of chart.

      • setIntersect

        public void setIntersect(boolean intersect)
        if true, the tooltip mode applies only when the mouse position intersects with an element. If false, the mode will be applied at all times.
        Parameters:
        intersect - if true, the tooltip mode applies only when the mouse position intersects with an element. If false, the mode will be applied at all times.

      • isIntersect

        public boolean isIntersect()
        if true, the tooltip mode applies only when the mouse position intersects with an element. If false, the mode will be applied at all times.
        Returns:
        if true, the tooltip mode applies only when the mouse position intersects with an element. If false, the mode will be applied at all times.

      • merge

        public final void merge(NativeObjectContainer source,
                        java.lang.String property)
        Merge a native object into this one with a specific property name.
        This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration into options of chart.
        Parameters:
        source - native object container to add
        property - property name
